solution_line_template: The total rain was {monday_morning_rain} inches + {monday_later_rain} inches = <<{monday_morning_rain}+{monday_later_rain}={total_monday_rain}>>{total_monday_rain} inches on Monday.
The total rain was {tuesday_multiplier} * {total_monday_rain} inches = <<{tuesday_multiplier}*{total_monday_rain}={total_tuesday_rain}>>{total_tuesday_rain} inches on Tuesday.
The total rain was {wednesday_rain} inches + {thursday_rain} inch = <<{wednesday_rain}+{thursday_rain}={total_wed_thu_rain}>>{total_wed_thu_rain} inch across Wednesday and Thursday.

The total rain was {total_monday_rain} inches + {total_tuesday_rain} inches + {total_wed_thu_rain} inch = <<{total_monday_rain}+{total_tuesday_rain}+{total_wed_thu_rain}={total_friday_rain}>>{total_friday_rain} inches on Friday.

There were {total_monday_rain} inches + {total_tuesday_rain} inches + {total_wed_thu_rain} inch + {total_friday_rain} inches = <<{total_monday_rain}+{total_tuesday_rain}+{total_wed_thu_rain}+{total_friday_rain}={total_week_rain}>>{total_week_rain} inches total last week.
{total_week_rain} inches/{number_of_days_for_average} days = <<{total_week_rain}/{number_of_days_for_average}={average_daily_rain}>>{average_daily_rain} inches average daily rain.
